name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Clipboard - Type less, browse faster.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your frequently used info and never type them again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Clipboard makes your browsing journey less frustrating.

Instead of having to type too often the same info such as your e-mail, just paste them!
Save them only once in the extension, and retrieve them from any synced devices.

Edit and delete your information within a cutting-edge user experience.

Filter your info using the search bar.
